title: Mobile Microlearning Course for Problem-Solving and Mathematical Reasoning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematical concepts and logical reasoning skills
context.additional_context: A course designed to enhance complex thinking skills by applying mathematical reasoning and problem-solving strategies for language learners

learning_goals: Learners can generate at least three solution strategies in various problem situations.
Learners can validate problem-solving approaches through collaborative discussion and select optimal solutions.
Learners can visually represent mathematical reasoning processes (text, graphics, gestures, etc.) and incorporate peer feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
